FIELD.COMMENT: Banner term code for which this enrolment applies

FIELD.COMMENT: The role code for the enrolment

FIELD.COMMENT: The current status of the enrolment

FIELD.COMMENT: A status field used to track enrolments from an extract

FIELD.COMMENT: If the enrolment was added to the moodle db properly

FIELD.NAME: gradable
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 if this membership is gradable

FIELD.COMMENT: The grade mode for the midterm result

FIELD.NAME: midtermsubmitted
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 if the midterm grade has been submitted

FIELD.NAME: finalgrademode
FIELD.COMMENT: The grade mode for the final grade

FIELD.NAME: finalsubmitted
FIELD.COMMENT: 1 if the final grade has been submitted

FIELD.COMMENT: The time the xml was received

FIELD.COMMENT: The type the xml is (group, person, membership)

FIELD.COMMENT: If the xml was process successfully.
